label: uRICommunication
comment: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication for this trade party, such as a web or email address.
The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication for this transport service, such as its website or email address.
Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication information for this location party, such as a web or email address.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role related to a location.
Work or the doing of work for another or community to include utilities and transport.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
